# Wikilinks

## Simple Wikilinks

Link to a page: [[simple-page]]

Link to another page: [[getting-started]]

## Wikilinks with Display Title

Link with custom text: [[page|Display Title]]

Another: [[api-reference|API Reference Guide]]

## Wikilinks with Paths

Nested page: [[path/to/page]]

Deep path: [[docs/guides/installation]]

## Wikilinks with Custom Text and Paths

Full path with title: [[docs/api/themes|Theme API Documentation]]

## Edge Cases

Wikilink with special characters: [[page-with-dashes]]

Wikilink with numbers: [[page123]]

Wikilink with spaces: [[page with spaces]]

Empty wikilink: [[]]

## Wikilinks in Context

You should read the [[getting-started|Getting Started]] guide before
diving into the [[api-reference|API Reference]]. For theme customization,
see [[themes/custom-themes]].

Multiple wikilinks in one paragraph: [[page-a]], [[page-b]], and [[page-c|Page C]].
